tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE property_ownership_records (
  property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  owner_id UUID NOT NULL,
  owner_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  property_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  ownership_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  ownership_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE property_ownerships (
    property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_id UUID,
    owner_name VARCHAR(255),
    ownership_start_date DATE,
    ownership_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE property_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id UUID,
    seller_id UUID,
    buyer_id UUID,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PropertyOwnership (
    ownership_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id UUID REFERENCES Properties(property_id),
    owner_id UUID REFERENCES Owners(owner_id),
    ownership_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    ownership_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PropertyTransactions ( 
    TransactionID INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    PropertyID INT NOT NULL, 
    BuyerID INT NOT NULL, 
    SellerID INT NOT NULL, 
    TransactionDate DATE NOT NULL, 
    TransactionAmount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL 
);
